page.title: 20Credits
page.content: Although the co-ordination for this Block was done at{Danesfield School } and the School contact there provided a lot of the information much of the field work was done by the pupils of {Stogumber First School. } This tiny Village School with not many more than 20 pupils,a full time headmistress and a partime teacher have been facing the threat of closure for many years though this does now seem to have receded. The following children took part in the Project. {Belinda Sellick, Georgina Scott,Maria {Howitt and Lucy Pitt all aged 8. {Natalie Williams, Helen Sellick,Jason {Comer, Damien Ryder, Jonathan Pitt all {aged 7 {And Richard Mackie Aged 6.
